channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: My friend’s father gifted her Tesla and Google stock. They could be worth millions. Will they be split 50/50 in her divorce?
item.description: “My friend is working on an exit plan.”

item.title: Keychain raises $30M and launches AI operating system for CPG manufacturers
item.description: Keychain states it's currently being used by top CPG brands and food retailers including 7-Eleven, Whole Foods, and General Mills.

item.title: Intel’s stock surges on SoftBank investment and potential U.S. government stake. Here’s why the rally could crumble.
item.description: More investment can’t solve Intel’s main problem: It doesn’t have enough customers.
